title: Do Califf. An announcement that it will pay undocumented residents CAVID-19 to stimulate while putting off first responders?
subtitle: Mimi has linked two separate events together to stir up political controversy.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: On the same day that California announced that it would provide incentive payments to some undocumented residents, COVID-19 also announced that it would separate first responders due to lack of funds.
